;I am currently a student, a single mother and all the jobs that go with that. My student loans are paying my bills! I even tried to pay the interest while I am in school and I was told noone had ever done that, they don't know how to do that. Sometimes student loans can be a blessing. I know I will have to pay it back, the hope is it will be worth it.
